name: Real Time Cloud Services
tag_list: quickbooks-hosting, hosted-quickbooks, hosted-book-keeping, crm-application-hosting, application-hosting, cloud-computing, cloud-hosting, remote-computer-support, managed-it
overview:
Real Time Cloud Services provides online computing solutions for small and Medium Business. The company provides complete range of Solutions such as Cloud Hosting, Application Hosting and managed IT services. The domains that we are catering involves accounting application hosting, CRM application Hosting as well as Tax application Hosting.

Cloud computing is one of the emerging technology that bridges the technological divide between small business and their larger counterparts and Real Time cloud is a pioneer with respect to providing these technology for the benefit of small business. Whether be it hosting of Applications, work group servers or Virtual private network RTCS provides the most reliable and dependable services.

What services do we provide? By Sage, and other open source free CRM applications â€¢Tax software Applications such as Lacerte, Proseries, Drake, ATX We are also into managed services which include: â€¢Remote computer support and repair services â€¢Hosted VOIP/PBX â€¢Remote IT infrastructure management

Our USP ? Trust, reliability and customer satisfaction are the things which we always keep as our core objectives. Besides this we are ever ready to cater to the varied needs of our clients in following manner: 24x7x365 support: get anytime always on customer support for any technical problem you encounter Technical Expertise: We have the most experienced Microsoft certified expertise to troubleshoot your problems High security: customer data can never be more secure than with our SAS-II certified Tier IV data centers Cost efficient: Quality of the services together with affordable prices helps you to reduce IT support cost in an unprecedented way.
